channel.title: Adding new GFX
channel.description:
I tried adding new graphics in class23, but when I add the model and reset the client, the models don't show up. It works perfectly on another client, but the model wont show on mine. Anyone know the correct way to add new GFX? I know I'm not giving much information, but I really don't know what I'm doing. Here's my class23 code it that helps.
[code=Java]if(j == 756){ aClass23Array403[j].anInt405 = 16935;// Model aClass23Array403[j].anInt406 = 4450; // animation aClass23Array403[j].aClass20_407 = Class20.aClass20Array351[aClass23Array403[j].anInt406];// Update }[/code]
My client doesn't disconnect or anything, its just that the model wont show up.

item.title: Adding new GFX
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I tried adding new graphics in class23, but when I add the model and reset the client, the models don’t show up. It works perfectly on another client, but the model wont show on mine. Anyone know the correct way to add new GFX? I know I’m not giving much information, but I really don’t know what I’m doing. Here’s my class23 code it that helps.

if(j == 756){ aClass23Array403[j].anInt405 = 16935;// Model aClass23Array403[j].anInt406 = 4450; // animation aClass23Array403[j].aClass20_407 = Class20.aClass20Array351[aClass23Array403[j].anInt406];// Update }

My client doesn’t disconnect or anything, its just that the model wont show up.
